### Rust array

```rust
fn main() {
    let mut v: [i32; 4] = vec![1,2,3,4];
    for i in 0..4 {
        v[i] += 10;
    }
    println!("{:?}", v);
    // [11,12,13,14]
}
```

### Rust Vec

```rust
fn main() {
    let mut v: Vec<i32> = vec![1,2,3,4];
    v.push(5);
    for i in 0..v.len() {
        v[i] += 10;
    }
    v.push(6);
    println!("{:?}", v);
    // [11,12,13,14,15,6]
    v.resize(10, 99);
    println!("{:?}", v);
    // [11,12,13,14,15,6,99,99,99,99]
}
```
